definition: lit. to direct blindly/to issue confused orders/to give contradictory directions
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to wave/to brandish/to command/to conduct/to scatter/to disperse

sentences.english: I cannot stand driving with a backseat driver.
sentences.chinese: 我無法忍受和一個愛對司機瞎指揮的人一起開車。

sentences.english: Of the new recruits is like the blind leading the blind.
sentences.chinese: 由他來帶新人那純粹是不懂瞎指揮。

sentences.english: I hate those backseat drivers when I'm doing my duty.
sentences.chinese: 當班的時候我可不喜歡那些瞎指揮的人。
